Have had good luck previously with Amazon renewed items, but never with such a high-ticket item.
This renewed iPhone far exceeds expectations: The device looks absolutely new, and iOS showed only 5 battery cycles!
Display is perfect in appearance and operation, no scratches / marks on case, display, or camera lenses.
Everything works perfectly - at a fraction of what a new one cost!
Highly recommended.
Will update if anything changes.

Was initially going back and forth between different quality tiers for renewed version both on Amazon and BackMarket, but ended up just paying a little more for Premium and I don‚Äôt regret it. Might have not snagged the once in a lifetime deal that was hiding out, but instead got what feels like a brand new device.
Only indication of any refurbishment is in the settings where the parts report informs me the display and camera were replaced with genuine apple parts, but I wouldn‚Äôt have guessed it.

Just received today. Phone came with a tempered glass screen protector installed already. Looks to be in pristine condition (purchased as premium), and has 100% battery health. Only thing I have noticed so far is the charging port keeps popping up that it‚Äôs charging but it could be my cord not the phone itself. I‚Äôll have to do more investigating on that. But so far it seems excellent condition as described.
Funciona bien, para el precio! Lo recomiendo
Excellent!

I needed an iPhone on a budget and came across this. With it being almost $200 less than an iPhone from the Apple Store, I was intrigued. Upon purchasing it, I knew I was buying a refurbished phone and there was a chance there could be scratches or battery issues. When I received the phone it came in good packaging, with a charger, and with a certificate of functionality. I was thrilled by the packaging. After opening the phone and setting it up, I checked the battery health and it is still at 100% with only 10 total charges! The phone had not been opened either for any kind of repairs! Overall a great purchase if you are looking to get the iPhone 15 Pro Max cheaper. This was the renewed premium one that came unlocked!

It does get hot initially when charging, but this is a known thing for even newer iPhone 15 pro maxes. It eventually goes away! Plus, if you are really that worried, just get a case and you wont have to worry about the heat even though it goes away. It is renewed premium so you have literally a whole year to return it if anything goes wrong... Anyways, funnily enough because of the 1 year return warranty, i suggest you get this over a new iphone 15 pro max that has like 15-30-90 day return policy because "renewed premium" has 365 days, just saying.
Like new and 100% battery
Happy with the phone, battery was perfect as well

The battery health is at 100% and the phone is excellent overall, however, the only thing is that there is a tiny chip on the glass. It‚Äôs not that visible when I'm using dark mode (which I usually use). I got use to it after a few days but it was sad seeing it initially.

I paid the extra $100 for refurbished premium from networkstore and the iphone I received had only been powered on once, was brand new with no flaws whatsoever looked like it came straight from a brand new box and repackaged.
The only downside is you don't get the original box to throw away after unboxing, but for $400 less than MSRP that isn't an issue. Didn't want to risk $500 off a regular refurbished

Hoy se cumplen 2 meses exactamente desde compre este producto; venian 3 protectores y hoy ya no tengo ninguno. En mi caso, la herramienta si quedo bien en mi iPhone 15 pro (tienes que usar la herramienta sin case), y fue un poco dificil de instalar mas que nada por el hecho de tratar que no entren particulas ni queden burbujas, pero creo eso en general conlleva mucha atencion para dejar una instalacion buena.
Vi que mucha gente decia que no pegaban bien las orillas o quedaban burbujas, pero vuelvo a lo mismo, creo que eso es mas dependiente de como lo instalan, a el producto en si.
Lo malo de este es la resistencia: 2 meses y ya use los 3 protectores, se rompen facilmente al uso cotidiando. El 1ero un dia lo saque de mi bolsillo y estaba astillado, el 2do lo mismo, y el 3ero si se me cayo el cel y se rompio (aunque cumplio su funcion y solo se estrello el protector y no la pantalla).
